gmcm.enabled.name: Enabled
gmcm.enabled.tooltip: If disabled, the mod won't change the pet bowl.
gmcm.onlyOnFarm.name: Only on Farm
gmcm.onlyOnFarm.tooltip: If enabled, only fills bowls on the Farm location. If disabled, scans all locations.
gmcm.showMessage.name: Show message
gmcm.showMessage.tooltip: Show a small HUD message after filling the bowl(s).
